thread.title: Excellent hotel, great location!
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel, great location! - Review of Hotel Palais de Chaillot, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Robex26
title: Excellent hotel, great location!
text:
Stayed at this hotel for 3 nights and had a great time. The hotel is in a great location with everything close by! We travelled as a couple and did a lot of sight seeing, this hotel was the perfect base. We had no complaints and found our room very comfortable. The free coffee machine in reception was great and was really good coffee!
Staff were very friendly and we would definitely return!
Room Tip: We stayed in a superior room, very comfortable! See more room tips
